caption.p: Proportion (bars) and number of positive cases (numbers in bars) per pathogen per month. Cases positive for two viruses are shown as one case. Indicated are also the minimum (lowest 19 °C in January) and maximum (highest 43 °C in April and May) temperatures in °C and rainfall in mm (lowest 0 mm, highest 275.5 mm in August) per month at weather station Tambacounda, Senegal, most close to Upper River Region, The Gambia ( https://www.worldweatheronline.com/basse-weather-averages/upper-river/gm.aspx).
